product_name: Adventure Medical Kits Adventure Travel Bath Wipes
long_description: Adventure Travel Bath Wipes from Adventure Medical Kits offer a fresh, just-out-of-the shower feeling when you're in the backcountry or heading straight back to the office after a lunchtime run. Wipes provide antibacterial, rinse-free bathing. Wipes are moistened with patented cleansing formula containing antibacterial agents, vitamins and moisturizers. PH-balanced, alcohol-free wipes are gentle on the skin. Resealable packaging makes these body wipes a great choice for both travelers and hikers. Active ingredients: Benzalkonium chloride (0.1%).
short_description: Adventure Travel Bath Wipes from Adventure Medical Kits offer a fresh, just-out-of-the shower feeling when you're in the backcountry or heading straight back to the office after a lunchtime run.
